text: In this game your task is to survive everything until you find the hidden treasures in the dungeon. There are different'dungeon tiles in this game. Each tile has four direct neighbours. The colors of the tiles are different and depend on the'neighbours. The dungeon always has wall around it which you can not step on and these tiles are represented by orange 'color.''Red color means there is a monster on it.''White means the neighbours are safe.''Yellow means there is a pit, a Black tile in the neighbourhood.''Green means the monster is somewhere on the neighbour tile.''Purple means there is a pit and also a monster next to this tile.''Gold talks for itself and last but not least the OceanBlue means that tile is unexplored, anything can be under it!
